dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 627 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand the definition of homeless veteran for purposes of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hahn (for herself and Mr. Benishek) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand the definition of homeless veteran for purposes of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Expansion of definition of homeless veteran for purposes of benefits under the laws administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 2002(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by inserting or (b) after section 103(a).
